venom_grumbo.name: Venom Grumbo
venom_grumbo.description: Poisonous. Toxic. But most importantly, Venomous. Venom Grumbo administers poison to its victims and deals extra damage to them as well!
venom_grumbo.victory: $name has claimed victory over Eddi-- Venom Grumbo!
venom_grumbo.loss: $name lay defeated in a pool of Venom Grumbo's toxic wasteland!

mixtape_grumbo.name: Mixtape Grumbo
mixtape_grumbo.description: Beware the super hot fire of the Mixtape Grumbo!
mixtape_grumbo.victory: $name dropped an even hotter album than Mixtape Grumbo!
mixtape_grumbo.loss: Mixtape Grumbo's mixtape was too fire for $name!

crimson_grumbo.name: Crimson Grumbo
crimson_grumbo.description: The red-eyed Crimson Grumbo. His crimson eyes make for some scary effects!
crimson_grumbo.loss: $name was smashed to bits by the Crimson Grumbo!

master_grumbo.name: Master Grumbo
master_grumbo.description: The Master of many Grumbos. Only those who are acknowledged by the Master Grumbo have a chance at beating him!
master_grumbo.victory: $name taught Master Grumbo the true way of the Grumbo!
master_grumbo.loss: It's 100 years too early for $name to take on Master Grumbo.
